itemLabel: Ann Taylor, Baroness Taylor of Bolton

wikipedia_page.main: Winifred Ann Taylor, Baroness Taylor of Bolton, PC (born 2 July 1947) is a British politician and life peer who served as Minister for International Defence and Security from 2008 to 2010. A member of the Labour Party, she was Member of Parliament (MP) for Bolton West from 1974 to 1983 and for Dewsbury from 1987 to 2005.

response: *  1947   – Ann Taylor, Baroness Taylor of Bolton, English politician, Minister for International Security Strategy
